column4: Hello, is anyone else having problems updating repositories residing on us.archive.ubuntu.com
Hello, is anyone else having problems updating repositories residing on us.archive.ubuntu.com
I have a command that will fix that if you want.
sudo sed -i.backup 's|us.archive|archive|g' /etc/apt/sources.list && sudo apt-get update
Thanks!!!  I'll give it a try....
You're welcome :)
I'm having the same problem
Can you pastebin the exact errors you are getting?
it stays stuck on "99% [Connecting to archive.ubuntu.com (91.189.88.31)] "
after a sudo apt-get update
That mirror may be slow, just wait it out or try again later.
That's what I needed to hear, thanks again!
Was that the same error you had with us.archive ?
yes it is....  It's been a couple days since I've been able to update from it....
I thought it might have something to do with the new release coming out soon why it's been unaccessible...
Ok, you can keep your sources.list as is or restore from the sources.list.backup. either is fine and is your call.
so i take it archive.ubuntu.com and us.archive.ubuntu.com are mirrors of each other then?
silly question, never mind...
One is a US mirror, yes. The command I gave you, the "-i.backup" bit made a backup of your sources.list before editing it, just in case you wanted to restore later. Have a look in /etc/apt
oic...  clever!
http://www.gtlib.gatech.edu/pub/mirrors/archive.ubuntu.com/ is a quick mirror of "http://archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/"
Nice, using different mirrors :)
